about_the_game:
Welcome to Girls Bus Adventure, the ultimate open-world driving game that lets you explore a virtual world of Miamoro city in search of the next big thing! Drive your trusty van through the bustling streets and scenic countryside, hunting for the hottest models and up-and-coming actresses. As you navigate your way through the world, you'll encounter a variety of challenges and obstacles that will test your skills and push you to the limit.

With stunning graphics, realistic physics, and engaging gameplay, Girls Bus Adventure is the perfect game for anyone who loves driving games, open-world exploration, and the thrill of the chase. Whether you're an experienced gamer or just starting out, you'll find something to love in this exciting new adventure.

So what are you waiting for? Hop behind the wheel of your bus and start your journey to fame and fortune today! Get Girls Bus Adventure now and discover the excitement and adventure that await you!

name: Girls Bus Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A thrilling adventure in an open-world environment! Drive a cool van as you search for the hottest models and up-and-coming actresses. With stunning graphics and engaging gameplay, you'll be hooked from the start. Experience the thrill of the hunt like never before!
